metadata.synopsis: Boss Friol finds that the Guild has already been wiped out, and she can now easily take control.
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_ATeleport to:S_LOW_Guildhall_Entrancea78a0b7b-489a-4743-9e6e-4c88f24cc2caKill the guildmembers and then ReCon:oe Debug_Guildhall_ZhentBetrayal

0.speaker: Boss Friol
0.text: Huh. Guild numbers seem thinner than they were. Well - they might just thank us for taking charge.
0.context: NodeContext: Entering Guildhall to see most of its fighters are dead. She was planning a hostile takeover that just got a lot easier. Shrugs, and carries on with her plan.
